quote.name: Drew DeVault, CEO SourceHut, Developer of KnightOS, Sway, Aerc, and others
quote.text: "Ada and Zangemann is a wonderful book which frames the vision of software freedom in a colorful, exciting, and accessible way that should connect to readers of all ages without being overbearing. Ada is a wonderful girl and I hope her spirit of community and freedom is something that young readers will bring to their own lives."
